013package org.apache.juneau.rest.vars;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.http.response.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.objecttools.*;
017import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
019
020/**
021 * Swagger attribute variable resolver.
022 *
023 * <p>
024 * The format for this var is <js>"$SS{key1[,key2...]}"</js>.
025 * <br>When multiple keys are used, returns the first non-null/empty value.
026 *
027 * <p>
028 * Example values:
029 * <ul>
030 *    <li><js>"info/title"</js>
031 *    <li><js>"info/description"</js>
032 *    <li><js>"info/contact/name"</js>
033 * </ul>
034 *
035 * <ul class='notes'>
036 *    <li class='note'>
037 *       This variable resolver requires that a {@link RestRequest} bean be available in the session bean store.
038 *    <li class='note'>
039 *       For security reasons, nested and recursive variables are not resolved.
040 * </ul>
041 *
042 * <ul class='seealso'>
043 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.SimpleVariableLanguage.jm.SvlVariables">SVL Variables</a>
044 * </ul>
045 */
046public class SwaggerVar extends MultipartResolvingVar {
047
048   /** The name of this variable. */
049   public static final String NAME = "SS";
050
051   /**
052    * Constructor.
053    */
054   public SwaggerVar() {
055      super(NAME);
056   }
057
058   @Override /* Var */
059   protected boolean allowNested() {
060      return false;
061   }
062
063   @Override /* Var */
064   protected boolean allowRecurse() {
065      return false;
066   }
067
068   @Override /* Var */
069   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String key) {
070      RestRequest req = session.getBean(RestRequest.class).orElseThrow(InternalServerError::new);
071      return new ObjectRest(req.getSwagger()).getString(key);
072   }
073
074   @Override /* Var */
075   public boolean canResolve(VarResolverSession session) {
076      return session.getBean(RestRequest.class).isPresent();
077   }
078}
